summary.name: summary
summary.value: Duplicated XHMTL ID's generated in certain cases when working with subforms, on dt and dd decorators

description.name: description

value.body:
I am getting same problem again.

Each subform is added like this:

        for($i=1; $i<=2; $i++){
    		$this->addSubForm(new $subformClass(), $i, 100+$i);
    		$this->$i->setLegend('Website '.$i.' Information');
    	}


See a raw sample of html output.




<dt id="1-label"> </dt><dd id="1-element"><fieldset id="fieldset-1"><legend>Website 1 Information</legend>
<dl>
<dt id="name-label"><label for="websites-1-name" class="required">Name</label></dt>
<dd id="name-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][name]" id="websites-1-name" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="url-label"><label for="websites-1-url" class="required">Url</label></dt>
<dd id="url-element">

<input type="text" name="websites[1][url]" id="websites-1-url" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="description-label"><label for="websites-1-description" class="required">Description</label></dt>
<dd id="description-element">
<textarea name="websites[1][description]" id="websites-1-description" rows="24" cols="80"></textarea></dd>
<dt id="page_views_monthly-label"><label for="websites-1-page_views_monthly" class="required">Page views per month</label></dt>
<dd id="page_views_monthly-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][page_views_monthly]" id="websites-1-page_views_monthly" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="unique_visitors_monthly-label"><label for="websites-1-unique_visitors_monthly" class="required">Unique visitors per month</label></dt>
<dd id="unique_visitors_monthly-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][unique_visitors_monthly]" id="websites-1-unique_visitors_monthly" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="traffic_continents-label"><label for="websites-1-traffic_continents" class="required">List top 3 traffic continents</label></dt>
<dd id="traffic_continents-element">

<input type="text" name="websites[1][traffic_continents]" id="websites-1-traffic_continents" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="statistical_data_source-label"><label for="websites-1-statistical_data_source" class="required">Statistical data source</label></dt>
<dd id="statistical_data_source-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][statistical_data_source]" id="websites-1-statistical_data_source" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="mailinglist-label"><label for="websites-1-mailinglist" class="required">Do you maintain a mailing list?</label></dt>
<dd id="mailinglist-element">
<input type="hidden" name="websites[1][mailinglist]" value="0" /><input type="checkbox" name="websites[1][mailinglist]" id="websites-1-mailinglist" value="1" /></dd>
<dt id="mailinglist_members-label"><label for="websites-1-mailinglist_members" class="required">How many members?</label></dt>
<dd id="mailinglist_members-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][mailinglist_members]" id="websites-1-mailinglist_members" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="ad_network-label"><label for="websites-1-ad_network" class="required">Which ad network do you use ?</label></dt>
<dd id="ad_network-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][ad_network]" id="websites-1-ad_network" value="" /></dd>

<dt id="ad_sales-label"><label for="websites-1-ad_sales" class="required">Do you sell ads directly, and not through an ad network ?</label></dt>
<dd id="ad_sales-element">
<input type="hidden" name="websites[1][ad_sales]" value="0" /><input type="checkbox" name="websites[1][ad_sales]" id="websites-1-ad_sales" value="1" /></dd>
<dt id="user_login-label"><label for="websites-1-user_login" class="required">Does this site require a user login?</label></dt>
<dd id="user_login-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][user_login]" id="websites-1-user_login" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="user_demographics-label"><label for="websites-1-user_demographics" class="required">Are you collecting member demographics?</label></dt>
<dd id="user_demographics-element">
<input type="hidden" name="websites[1][user_demographics]" value="0" /><input type="checkbox" name="websites[1][user_demographics]" id="websites-1-user_demographics" value="1" /></dd>
<dt id="user_demographics_details-label"><label for="websites-1-user_demographics_details" class="required">Please list each</label></dt>
<dd id="user_demographics_details-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[1][user_demographics_details]" id="websites-1-user_demographics_details" value="" /></dd></dl></fieldset></dd>
<dt id="2-label"> </dt><dd id="2-element"><fieldset id="fieldset-2"><legend>Website 2 Information</legend>

<dl>
<dt id="name-label"><label for="websites-2-name" class="required">Name</label></dt>

<dt id="page_views_monthly-label"><label for="websites-2-page_views_monthly" class="required">Page views per month</label></dt>
<dd id="page_views_monthly-element">

<input type="text" name="websites[2][page_views_monthly]" id="websites-2-page_views_monthly" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="unique_visitors_monthly-label"><label for="websites-2-unique_visitors_monthly" class="required">Unique visitors per month</label></dt>
<dd id="unique_visitors_monthly-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][unique_visitors_monthly]" id="websites-2-unique_visitors_monthly" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="traffic_continents-label"><label for="websites-2-traffic_continents" class="required">List top 3 traffic continents</label></dt>
<dd id="traffic_continents-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][traffic_continents]" id="websites-2-traffic_continents" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="statistical_data_source-label"><label for="websites-2-statistical_data_source" class="required">Statistical data source</label></dt>
<dd id="statistical_data_source-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][statistical_data_source]" id="websites-2-statistical_data_source" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="mailinglist-label"><label for="websites-2-mailinglist" class="required">Do you maintain a mailing list?</label></dt>
<dd id="mailinglist-element">
<input type="hidden" name="websites[2][mailinglist]" value="0" /><input type="checkbox" name="websites[2][mailinglist]" id="websites-2-mailinglist" value="1" /></dd>

<dt id="mailinglist_members-label"><label for="websites-2-mailinglist_members" class="required">How many members?</label></dt>
<dd id="mailinglist_members-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][mailinglist_members]" id="websites-2-mailinglist_members" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="ad_network-label"><label for="websites-2-ad_network" class="required">Which ad network do you use ?</label></dt>
<dd id="ad_network-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][ad_network]" id="websites-2-ad_network" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="ad_sales-label"><label for="websites-2-ad_sales" class="required">Do you sell ads directly, and not through an ad network ?</label></dt>
<dd id="ad_sales-element">
<input type="hidden" name="websites[2][ad_sales]" value="0" /><input type="checkbox" name="websites[2][ad_sales]" id="websites-2-ad_sales" value="1" /></dd>
<dt id="user_login-label"><label for="websites-2-user_login" class="required">Does this site require a user login?</label></dt>
<dd id="user_login-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][user_login]" id="websites-2-user_login" value="" /></dd>
<dt id="user_demographics-label"><label for="websites-2-user_demographics" class="required">Are you collecting member demographics?</label></dt>

<dd id="user_demographics-element">
<input type="hidden" name="websites[2][user_demographics]" value="0" /><input type="checkbox" name="websites[2][user_demographics]" id="websites-2-user_demographics" value="1" /></dd>

<dd id="user_demographics_details-element">
<input type="text" name="websites[2][user_demographics_details]" id="websites-2-user_demographics_details" value="" /></dd></dl></fieldset></dd>

Any idea when the changes suggested by Bert Van Hauwaert would be added to trunk ?

Due to this bugs working with multiple levels of subforms seems to be a totally mess...

The same problem is at rendering subforms itself,

i got lot of id's as:
1-label
1-element

for dt and dd elements of the subform.

And of course, the same for fieldsets where i have lot of id's like:

fieldset-1,
fieldset-2

So basically the way are created the ID's are breaking the XHMTL, and would make working with client side js to become more complicated, because we simply can't trust the id's...
Bert Van Hauwaert, i think the Zend_Form_Element fix doesn't work.

This bug is still present as of ZF 1.10.

A subform (52) within a subform (analysts) with a form:

<fieldset id="fieldset-52"><dl>
<dt id="firstName-label"><label for="analysts-52-firstName" class="required">First name</label></dt>
<dd id="firstName-element">
<input name="analysts[52][firstName]" id="analysts-52-firstName" value="" class="required valid" type="text"></dd>
<dt id="lastName-label"><label for="analysts-52-lastName" class="required">Last name</label></dt>
<dd id="lastName-element">
<input name="analysts[52][lastName]" id="analysts-52-lastName" value="" class="required" type="text"></dd>
<dt id="delete-label"><label for="analysts-52-delete" class="optional">Delete?</label></dt>
<dd id="delete-element">
<input name="analysts[52][delete]" value="0" type="hidden"><input name="analysts[52][delete]" id="analysts-52-delete" value="1" type="checkbox"></dd></dl></fieldset>
